testimonials.text: Somsubhra is an Excellent Full Stack MERN Developer. Great Pleasure working with him on various projects. Focused and hardworking!

He is a talented full stack developer. He is passionate in making websites, desktop apps, mobile apps. He is very hardworking, disciplined loyal and focused . I worked with him in the same group and it was pleasure to work with him. He can handle web development projects with skills in frontend and backend. He is interested in technical development and always works on the tasks in time.

Somsubhra is a very hard working boy. He always works on different technologies & also he is very good in coding. I have worked with him so i know that he is a very good team mate & he also have a very good leadership quality.
